author: danj
msg: Fix for MUSE-32 - support for JAX-WS deployment. This code was written by Balan S. using the original Axis 1.x
support as a base. I modified the code submitted to JIRA to include the original error messages (where
applicable), logging, initialization using the ServiceLifecycle methods, and a few init checks.
NOTE: This code is not in the Maven build yet because it requires an API (JSR-250 - javax.annotation.*) for
which there is no JAR file in the Maven2 repository. Right now one must download either the Sun RI or some
other impl and use that for compilation - we hope to resolve this as soon as JSR-250 is available from Apache.

author: nagy
msg: Added a plugpoint to allow QoSes to register code that can migrate information between the contexts and thread local storage at the programming model implementation layer.  For more information, see the ThreadContextMigrator interface.

author: danj
msg: Updated build instructions for Muse 2.x, with some tips on getting Maven2 up and running.
